meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Stop</kanji>! That's <kanji>prohibition</kanji> (prohibited)! When something is prohibited and you're forced to stop, that thing is obviously <vocabulary>forbidden</vocabulary>. If you see this you should probably not do the thing it's telling you not to do.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
